entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:09 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -35.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: WNW 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 34.
